details:
verb
- cause to separate
= synonyms: scatter
- cause to become widely known
= synonyms: diffuse
- distribute loosely
= synonyms: sprinkle
- separate (light) into spectral rays
= example: separate (light) into spectral rays
- move away from each other
= example: move away from each other
= synonyms: scatter
- to cause to separate and go in different directions
= synonyms: scatter
